<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools">
<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.CAMERA" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" android:maxSdkVersion="28" />
<uses-feature android:name="android.hardware.camera" android:required="true" /> <uses-feature android:name="android.hardware.camera.ar" android:required="true" />
<application android:allowBackup="true" android:dataExtractionRules="@xml/data_extraction_rules" android:fullBackupContent="@xml/backup_rules" android:icon="@mipmap/ic_launcher" android:label="@string/app_name" android:roundIcon="@mipmap/ic_launcher_round" android:supportsRtl="true" android:theme="@style/Theme.PaxelARValidator" tools:targetApi="31">
<activity android:name=".ui.main.MainActivity" android:exported="true"> <intent-filter> <action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" /> <category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" /> </intent-filter> </activity>
<activity android:name=".ui.measurement.ARMeasurementActivity" android:theme="@style/Theme.PaxelARSpaceScan.NoActionBar" />
<activity android:name=".ui.result.ResultActivity" android:theme="@style/Theme.PaxelARSpaceScan.NoActionBar.Result" />
<activity android:name=".ui.history.HistoryActivity" />
<meta-data android:name="com.google.ar.core" android:value="required" />
</application>
</manifest>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/background_light_cream">
<!-- Material Toolbar --> <com.google.android.material.appbar.MaterialToolbar android:id="@+id/toolbar" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="?attr/actionBarSize" android:background="@color/primary" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:title="Riwayat Pengukuran" app:titleTextColor="@color/white" />
<!-- Search Bar --> <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:id="@+id/searchCard" style="@style/Widget.PaxelAR.CardView" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="16dp" app:cardElevation="1dp" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/toolbar">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout style="@style/Widget.Material3.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="8dp" android:hint="@string/search_hint" app:boxStrokeWidth="0dp" app:boxStrokeWidthFocused="1dp" app:endIconMode="clear_text" app:startIconDrawable="@drawable/ic_search">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/etSearch" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@android:color/transparent" android:inputType="text" android:maxLines="1" />
</com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
</com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
<!-- RecyclerView --> <androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/recyclerView" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp" android:clipToPadding="false" android:paddingHorizontal="16dp" android:paddingBottom="16dp" android:scrollbars="vertical" android:scrollbarStyle="outsideOverlay" android:fadeScrollbars="true" app:layoutManager="androidx.recyclerview.widget.LinearLayoutManager" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/searchCard" tools:listitem="@layout/item_measurement" />
<!-- Empty State --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/emptyStateLayout" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center" android:orientation="vertical" android:visibility="gone" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/searchCard">
<ImageView android:layout_width="120dp" android:layout_height="120dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:alpha="0.6" android:src="@drawable/ic_search" android:tint="@color/text_medium_gray" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvEmpty" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/no_measurements_found" android:textAppearance="?attr/textAppearanceTitleMedium" android:textColor="@color/text_medium_gray" android:textAlignment="center" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:text="Mulai pengukuran pertama Anda" android:textAppearance="?attr/textAppearanceBodyMedium" android:textColor="@color/text_medium_gray" android:textAlignment="center" />
</LinearLayout>
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/background_light_cream">
<!-- Material Toolbar --> <com.google.android.material.appbar.MaterialToolbar android:id="@+id/toolbar" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="?attr/actionBarSize" android:background="@color/primary" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:title="Riwayat Pengukuran" app:titleTextColor="@color/white" />
<!-- Search Bar --> <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:id="@+id/searchCard" style="@style/Widget.PaxelAR.CardView" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="16dp" app:cardElevation="1dp" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/toolbar">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout style="@style/Widget.Material3.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="8dp" android:hint="@string/search_hint" app:boxStrokeWidth="0dp" app:boxStrokeWidthFocused="1dp" app:endIconMode="clear_text" app:startIconDrawable="@drawable/ic_search">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/etSearch" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@android:color/transparent" android:inputType="text" android:maxLines="1" />
</com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
</com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
<!-- RecyclerView --> <androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/recyclerView" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp" android:clipToPadding="false" android:paddingHorizontal="16dp" android:paddingBottom="16dp" android:scrollbars="vertical" android:scrollbarStyle="outsideOverlay" android:fadeScrollbars="true" app:layoutManager="androidx.recyclerview.widget.LinearLayoutManager" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/searchCard" tools:listitem="@layout/item_measurement" />
<!-- Empty State --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/emptyStateLayout" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center" android:orientation="vertical" android:visibility="gone" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/searchCard">
<ImageView android:layout_width="120dp" android:layout_height="120dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:alpha="0.6" android:src="@drawable/ic_search" app:tint="@color/text_medium_gray" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvEmpty" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/no_measurements_found" android:textAppearance="?attr/textAppearanceTitleMedium" android:textColor="@color/text_medium_gray" android:textAlignment="center" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:text="Mulai pengukuran pertama Anda" android:textAppearance="?attr/textAppearanceBodyMedium" android:textColor="@color/text_medium_gray" android:textAlignment="center" />
</LinearLayout>
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/white">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/ivLogo" android:layout_width="120dp" android:layout_height="120dp" android:src="@mipmap/ic_paxel_logo" android:scaleType="centerInside" android:adjustViewBounds="true" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvAppName" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="24dp" android:text="Paxel AR SpaceScan" android:textColor="@color/paxel_red" android:textSize="24sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/ivLogo" />
<ProgressBar android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="48dp" android:indeterminateTint="@color/paxel_red" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/background_light_cream">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/ivLogo" android:layout_width="120dp" android:layout_height="120dp" android:src="@mipmap/ic_paxel_logo" android:scaleType="centerInside" android:adjustViewBounds="true" app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/tvAppName" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:layout_constraintVertical_chainStyle="packed" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvAppName" style="?attr/textAppearanceHeadlineLarge" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="24dp" android:text="Paxel AR SpaceScan" android:textColor="@color/primary" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/lottieLoading" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/ivLogo" />
<!-- Lottie Animation for Loading --> <com.airbnb.lottie.LottieAnimationView android:id="@+id/lottieLoading" android:layout_width="80dp" android:layout_height="80dp" android:layout_marginTop="32dp" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/tvAppName" app:lottie_autoPlay="true" app:lottie_loop="true" app:lottie_rawRes="@raw/loading_animation" />
<!-- Fallback Progress Bar (if Lottie fails) --> <ProgressBar android:id="@+id/progressBarFallback" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:visibility="gone" android:indeterminateTint="@color/primary" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/tvAppName" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@color/surface_cream" android:padding="24dp">
<!-- Bottom Sheet Handle --> <View android:layout_width="32dp" android:layout_height="4dp" android:layout_gravity="center_horizontal" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:background="@color/text_medium_gray" android:alpha="0.4" />
<!-- Title --> <TextView style="?attr/textAppearanceTitleMedium" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp" android:text="@string/package_name_title" android:textColor="@color/text_dark_gray" />
<!-- Package Name Input --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/tilPackageName" style="@style/Widget.Material3.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:hint="@string/package_name_hint" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomEnd="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomStart="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusTopEnd="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusTopStart="12dp" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/primary" app:hintTextColor="@color/text_medium_gray">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/etPackageName" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:inputType="text" android:maxLines="1" android:textColor="@color/text_dark_gray" android:textSize="16sp" />
</com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Declared Size Dropdown --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/tilDeclaredSize" style="@style/Widget.Material3.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox.ExposedDropdownMenu" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="32dp" android:hint="@string/declared_size_hint" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomEnd="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomStart="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusTopEnd="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusTopStart="12dp" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/primary" app:hintTextColor="@color/text_medium_gray">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.MaterialAutoCompleteTextView android:id="@+id/autoCompleteTextView" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:inputType="none" android:textColor="@color/text_dark_gray" android:textSize="16sp" />
</com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Buttons --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="end">
<!-- Tertiary Button: Cancel --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btnCancel" style="@style/Widget.PaxelAR.Button.Text" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" android:text="@string/cancel" android:textColor="@color/text_medium_gray" />
<!-- Primary Button: Submit --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btnSubmit" style="@style/Widget.PaxelAR.Button" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/ok" app:backgroundTint="@color/primary" />
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="8dp" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp" app:cardElevation="3dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/card_background">
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:padding="16dp">
<!-- Package Thumbnail Image --> <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:id="@+id/cvThumbnail" android:layout_width="72dp" android:layout_height="72dp" app:cardCornerRadius="8dp" app:cardElevation="2dp" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/ivPackageThumbnail" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:background="@color/gray_100" android:contentDescription="Package thumbnail" tools:src="@drawable/ic_local_shipping" />
</com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
<!-- Package Name --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tvPackageName" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" android:text="Package Name" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:ellipsize="end" android:maxLines="1" app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@+id/btnDelete" app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@+id/cvThumbnail" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@+id/cvThumbnail" tools:text="Sample Package" />
<!-- Measurement Details Container --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/llMeasurementDetails" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" android:orientation="horizontal" app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@+id/btnDelete" app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@+id/cvThumbnail" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/tvPackageName">
<!-- Length --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="L" android:textColor="@color/accent_highlight" android:textSize="12sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvLength" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="0" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:textSize="14sp" android:textStyle="bold" tools:text="25" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="cm" android:textColor="@color/text_tertiary" android:textSize="10sp" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Width --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="W" android:textColor="@color/accent_highlight" android:textSize="12sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvWidth" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="0" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:textSize="14sp" android:textStyle="bold" tools:text="15" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="cm" android:textColor="@color/text_tertiary" android:textSize="10sp" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Height --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="H" android:textColor="@color/accent_highlight" android:textSize="12sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvHeight" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="0" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:textSize="14sp" android:textStyle="bold" tools:text="10" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="cm" android:textColor="@color/text_tertiary" android:textSize="10sp" />
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Volume Display --> <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:id="@+id/cvVolume" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/accent_highlight_light" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="0dp" app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@+id/cvThumbnail" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/llMeasurementDetails">
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvVolume" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:paddingHorizontal="12dp" android:paddingVertical="4dp" android:text="Volume: 0 cm³" android:textColor="@color/accent_highlight_dark" android:textSize="12sp" android:textStyle="bold" tools:text="Volume: 3,750 cm³" />
</com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
<!-- Date --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tvDate" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:text="Date" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:textSize="12sp" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="@+id/cvThumbnail" app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@+id/btnDelete" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/cvThumbnail" tools:text="Aug 12, 2025 - 14:30" />
<!-- Delete Button --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btnDelete" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.TextButton.Icon" android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:contentDescription="Delete measurement" app:icon="@drawable/ic_delete" app:iconTint="@color/error" app:iconGravity="textStart" app:iconPadding="0dp" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
</com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" style="@style/Widget.PaxelAR.CardView" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginVertical="4dp" android:clickable="true" android:focusable="true" android:foreground="?attr/selectableItemBackground">
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:padding="16dp">
<!-- Package Thumbnail --> <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:id="@+id/cvThumbnail" android:layout_width="56dp" android:layout_height="56dp" app:cardCornerRadius="8dp" app:cardElevation="1dp" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/ivPackageThumbnail" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/surface_variant" android:contentDescription="Package thumbnail" android:scaleType="centerCrop" tools:src="@drawable/ic_local_shipping" />
</com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
<!-- Package Name --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tvPackageName" style="?attr/textAppearanceTitleMedium" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" android:ellipsize="end" android:maxLines="1" android:text="Package Measurement" android:textColor="@color/text_dark_gray" app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@+id/btnExpand" app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@+id/cvThumbnail" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@+id/cvThumbnail" tools:text="Sample Package" />
<!-- Date --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tvDate" style="?attr/textAppearanceBodyLarge" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" android:text="Aug 12, 2025" android:textColor="@color/text_medium_gray" app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@+id/btnExpand" app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@+id/cvThumbnail" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/tvPackageName" tools:text="Aug 12, 2025 - 14:30" />
<!-- Expand Button --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btnExpand" style="@style/Widget.Material3.Button.IconButton" android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:contentDescription="Expand details" app:icon="@drawable/ic_expand_more" app:iconTint="@color/text_medium_gray" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<!-- Expandable Details Section --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/layoutExpandableDetails" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:orientation="vertical" android:visibility="gone" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/cvThumbnail" tools:visibility="visible">
<!-- Divider --> <View android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="1dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:background="@color/divider" />
<!-- Dimensions Grid --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:weightSum="3">
<!-- Length --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:gravity="center" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView style="?attr/textAppearanceBodyLarge" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="L" android:textColor="@color/primary" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvLength" style="?attr/textAppearanceBodyLarge" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:text="25.0" android:textColor="@color/text_dark_gray" android:textStyle="bold" tools:text="25.0" />
<TextView style="?attr/textAppearanceBodyLarge" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="cm" android:textColor="@color/text_medium_gray" android:textSize="12sp" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Width --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:gravity="center" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView style="?attr/textAppearanceBodyLarge" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="W" android:textColor="@color/primary" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvWidth" style="?attr/textAppearanceBodyLarge" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:text="15.0" android:textColor="@color/text_dark_gray" android:textStyle="bold" tools:text="15.0" />
<TextView style="?attr/textAppearanceBodyLarge" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="cm" android:textColor="@color/text_medium_gray" android:textSize="12sp" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Height --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:gravity="center" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView style="?attr/textAppearanceBodyLarge" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="H" android:textColor="@color/primary" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvHeight" style="?attr/textAppearanceBodyLarge" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:text="10.0" android:textColor="@color/text_dark_gray" android:textStyle="bold" tools:text="10.0" />
<TextView style="?attr/textAppearanceBodyLarge" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="cm" android:textColor="@color/text_medium_gray" android:textSize="12sp" />
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Volume Badge --> <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="center" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/accent_highlight_light" app:cardCornerRadius="20dp" app:cardElevation="0dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvVolume" style="?attr/textAppearanceBodyLarge" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:paddingHorizontal="16dp" android:paddingVertical="8dp" android:text="Volume: 3,750 cm³" android:textColor="@color/accent_highlight_dark" android:textStyle="bold" tools:text="Volume: 3,750 cm³" />
</com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
<!-- Action Buttons --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:gravity="end" android:orientation="horizontal">
<!-- Delete Button --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btnDelete" style="@style/Widget.Material3.Button.IconButton" android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:contentDescription="Delete measurement" app:icon="@drawable/ic_delete_outline" app:iconTint="@color/text_medium_gray" />
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
</com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <resources> <!-- Main Application Theme for API 27+ --> <style name="Theme.PaxelARSpaceScan" parent="Theme.MaterialComponents.Light.DarkActionBar"> <!-- Primary Brand Colors --> <item name="colorPrimary">@color/paxel_primary</item> <item name="colorOnPrimary">@color/white</item> <item name="colorPrimaryVariant">@color/paxel_primary_dark</item>
<!-- Secondary Colors --> <item name="colorSecondary">@color/paxel_accent</item> <item name="colorOnSecondary">@color/white</item> <item name="colorSecondaryVariant">@color/paxel_primary_light</item>
<!-- Background & Surface --> <item name="android:colorBackground">@color/background_primary</item> <item name="colorOnBackground">@color/text_primary</item> <item name="colorSurface">@color/surface_primary</item> <item name="colorOnSurface">@color/text_primary</item>
<!-- Status Bar --> <item name="android:statusBarColor">@color/paxel_primary</item> <item name="android:windowLightStatusBar">false</item>
<!-- Navigation Bar --> <item name="android:navigationBarColor">@color/surface_primary</item> <item name="android:windowLightNavigationBar">true</item>
<!-- Error Colors --> <item name="colorError">@color/error</item> <item name="colorOnError">@color/white</item>
<!-- Shape Appearances --> <item name="shapeAppearanceSmallComponent">@style/ShapeAppearance.PaxelAR.SmallComponent</item> <item name="shapeAppearanceMediumComponent">@style/ShapeAppearance.PaxelAR.MediumComponent</item> <item name="shapeAppearanceLargeComponent">@style/ShapeAppearance.PaxelAR.LargeComponent</item> </style> </resources>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <resources> <!-- App name --> <string name="app_name">Paxel AR Validator</string>
<!-- Main Activity --> <string name="main_title">Paxel AR Validator</string> <string name="subtitle">Ukur paket dengan teknologi AR</string> <string name="start_measurement">Mulai Pengukuran</string> <string name="view_history">Lihat Riwayat</string> <string name="version_info">Versi 1.0.0</string> <string name="settings">Pengaturan</string>
<!-- Feature descriptions --> <string name="feature_ar_measurement">Pengukuran AR yang akurat</string> <string name="feature_price_estimation">Estimasi harga instan</string> <string name="feature_history_tracking">Pelacakan riwayat pengukuran</string>
<!-- Package Input Dialog --> <string name="default_package_name">Paket</string> <string name="package_name_title">Masukkan Detail Paket</string> <string name="package_name_hint">Nama paket (opsional)</string> <string name="declared_size_hint">Pilih ukuran yang dinyatakan</string> <string name="ok">OK</string> <string name="cancel">Batal</string> <string name="dismiss">Tutup</string> <string name="select_declared_size_prompt">Pilih ukuran yang dinyatakan</string>
<!-- Measurement Instructions --> <string name="instruction_step_1">Arahkan kamera ke paket dan ketuk untuk memulai pengukuran</string> <string name="instruction_step_2">Ketuk titik kedua untuk membuat garis dasar</string> <string name="instruction_step_3">Ketuk bagian atas paket untuk mengukur tinggi</string> <string name="instruction_completed">Pengukuran selesai! Lihat hasil di bawah</string>
<!-- UI Labels --> <string name="tracking_help">Gerakkan perangkat untuk mendeteksi permukaan</string> <string name="detecting_surface">Mendeteksi permukaan...</string>
<!-- Buttons --> <string name="undo">Batalkan</string> <string name="reset">Reset</string> <string name="ambil_bukti_foto">Ambil Foto</string> <string name="btn_undo">Batalkan</string> <string name="btn_reset">Reset</string> <string name="btn_take_photo">Ambil Foto</string> <string name="btn_continue_to_result">Lanjutkan ke Hasil</string> <string name="btn_save">Simpan Hasil</string> <string name="btn_new_measurement">Pengukuran Baru</string> <string name="btn_view_history">Lihat Riwayat</string>
<!-- History --> <string name="no_measurements">Belum ada pengukuran tersimpan</string> <string name="search_hint">Cari pengukuran...</string> <string name="export_csv">Ekspor CSV</string> <string name="delete_all">Hapus Semua</string>
<!-- Measurements --> <string name="width">Lebar</string> <string name="height">Tinggi</string> <string name="depth">Panjang</string> <string name="volume">Volume</string> <string name="timestamp">Waktu</string> <string name="package_name">Nama Paket</string> <string name="declared_size">Ukuran yang Dinyatakan</string>
<!-- Error Messages --> <string name="error_camera_permission">Izin kamera diperlukan untuk pengukuran AR</string> <string name="error_ar_not_supported">Perangkat tidak mendukung ARCore</string> <string name="error_measurement_failed">Pengukuran gagal, silakan coba lagi</string>
<!-- Toast Messages --> <string name="measurement_saved">Pengukuran tersimpan</string> <string name="measurement_deleted">Pengukuran dihapus</string> <string name="photo_taken">Foto berhasil diambil</string>
<!-- Content Descriptions --> <string name="logo_description">Logo Paxel AR Validator</string> <string name="ar_measurement_icon">Ikon pengukuran AR</string> <string name="price_estimation_icon">Ikon estimasi harga</string> <string name="history_tracking_icon">Ikon pelacakan riwayat</string>
<!-- Result Activity Strings --> <string name="package_info">Informasi Paket</string> <string name="package_name_loading">Nama Paket: Loading...</string> <string name="declared_size_loading">Ukuran Deklarasi: Loading...</string> <string name="timestamp_loading">Waktu: Loading...</string> <string name="measurement_results">Hasil Pengukuran</string> <string name="width_label">Lebar:</string> <string name="height_label">Tinggi:</string> <string name="length_label">Panjang:</string> <string name="volume_label">Volume:</string> <string name="default_measurement">0.0 cm</string> <string name="default_volume">0.0 cm³</string> <string name="price_estimation">Estimasi Harga</string> <string name="default_price">Rp 20.000 (Sedang)</string> <string name="category_medium">Kategori: Sedang</string> <string name="status_saved">Status: Tersimpan</string>
<!-- Additional strings for Material Design 3 components --> <string name="expand_details">Tampilkan detail</string> <string name="collapse_details">Sembunyikan detail</string> <string name="measurement_saved_successfully">Pengukuran berhasil disimpan</string> <string name="start_first_measurement">Mulai pengukuran pertama Anda</string>
<!-- Activity Titles --> <string name="measurement_results">Hasil Pengukuran</string> <string name="package_info">Informasi Paket</string> <string name="price_estimation">Estimasi Harga</string>
<!-- Labels --> <string name="width_label">Lebar</string> <string name="height_label">Tinggi</string> <string name="length_label">Panjang</string> <string name="volume_label">Volume</string>
<!-- Default Values --> <string name="default_measurement">0.0 cm</string> <string name="default_volume">0.0 cm³</string> <string name="default_price">Rp0</string>
<!-- Button Labels --> <string name="btn_save">Simpan</string> <string name="btn_new_measurement">Ukur Lagi</string>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <resources> <!-- App name --> <string name="app_name">Paxel AR Validator</string>
<!-- Main Activity --> <string name="main_title">Paxel AR Validator</string> <string name="subtitle">Ukur paket dengan teknologi AR</string> <string name="start_measurement">Mulai Pengukuran</string> <string name="view_history">Lihat Riwayat</string> <string name="version_info">Versi 1.0.0</string> <string name="settings">Pengaturan</string>
<!-- Feature descriptions --> <string name="feature_ar_measurement">Pengukuran AR yang akurat</string> <string name="feature_price_estimation">Estimasi harga instan</string> <string name="feature_history_tracking">Pelacakan riwayat pengukuran</string>
<!-- Package Input Dialog --> <string name="default_package_name">Paket Default</string> <string name="package_name_title">Masukkan Detail Paket</string> <string name="package_name_hint">Nama paket (opsional)</string> <string name="declared_size_hint">Pilih ukuran yang dinyatakan</string> <string name="ok">OK</string> <string name="cancel">Batal</string> <string name="dismiss">Tutup</string> <string name="select_declared_size_prompt">Pilih ukuran yang dinyatakan</string>
<!-- Measurement Instructions --> <string name="instruction_step_1">Arahkan kamera ke paket dan ketuk untuk memulai pengukuran</string> <string name="instruction_step_2">Ketuk titik kedua untuk membuat garis dasar</string> <string name="instruction_step_3">Ketuk bagian atas paket untuk mengukur tinggi</string> <string name="instruction_completed">Pengukuran selesai! Lihat hasil di bawah</string>
<!-- UI Labels --> <string name="tracking_help">Gerakkan perangkat untuk mendeteksi permukaan</string> <string name="detecting_surface">Mendeteksi permukaan...</string>
<!-- Buttons --> <string name="undo">Batalkan</string> <string name="reset">Reset</string> <string name="ambil_bukti_foto">Ambil Foto</string> <string name="btn_undo">Batalkan</string> <string name="btn_reset">Reset</string> <string name="btn_take_photo">Ambil Foto</string> <string name="btn_continue_to_result">Lanjutkan ke Hasil</string> <string name="btn_save">Simpan Hasil</string> <string name="btn_new_measurement">Pengukuran Baru</string> <string name="btn_view_history">Lihat Riwayat</string>
<!-- History --> <string name="no_measurements">Belum ada pengukuran tersimpan</string> <string name="no_measurements_found">Tidak ada pengukuran</string> <string name="search_hint">Cari pengukuran...</string> <string name="export_csv">Ekspor CSV</string> <string name="delete_all">Hapus Semua</string>
<!-- Activity Titles --> <string name="measurement_results">Hasil Pengukuran</string> <string name="package_info">Informasi Paket</string> <string name="price_estimation">Estimasi Harga</string>
<!-- Measurements --> <string name="width">Lebar</string> <string name="height">Tinggi</string> <string name="depth">Panjang</string> <string name="volume">Volume</string> <string name="timestamp">Waktu</string> <string name="package_name">Nama Paket</string> <string name="declared_size">Ukuran yang Dinyatakan</string>

<!-- Default Values --> <string name="default_measurement">0.0 cm</string> <string name="default_volume">0.0 cm³</string> <string name="default_price">Rp0</string>
<!-- Error Messages --> <string name="error_camera_permission">Izin kamera diperlukan untuk pengukuran AR</string> <string name="error_ar_not_supported">Perangkat tidak mendukung ARCore</string> <string name="error_measurement_failed">Pengukuran gagal, silakan coba lagi</string>
<!-- Toast Messages --> <string name="measurement_saved">Pengukuran tersimpan</string> <string name="measurement_deleted">Pengukuran dihapus</string> <string name="photo_taken">Foto berhasil diambil</string>
<!-- Content Descriptions --> <string name="logo_description">Logo Paxel AR Validator</string> <string name="ar_measurement_icon">Ikon pengukuran AR</string> <string name="price_estimation_icon">Ikon estimasi harga</string> <string name="history_tracking_icon">Ikon pelacakan riwayat</string>
<!-- Result Activity Strings --> <string name="package_name_loading">Nama Paket: Loading...</string> <string name="declared_size_loading">Ukuran Deklarasi: Loading...</string> <string name="timestamp_loading">Waktu: Loading...</string> <string name="category_medium">Kategori: Sedang</string> <string name="status_saved">Status: Tersimpan</string>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <resources> <!-- Base Widget Style --> <style name="Widget.PaxelAR" parent=""> <!-- Base widget style --> </style>
<!-- Button styles --> <style name="Widget.PaxelAR.Button" parent="Widget.Material3.Button"> <item name="android:textColor">@color/on_primary</item> <item name="backgroundTint">@color/primary</item> <item name="cornerRadius">12dp</item> <item name="android:textAllCaps">false</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">sans-serif-medium</item> </style>
<style name="Widget.PaxelAR.Button.Secondary" parent="Widget.PaxelAR.Button"> <item name="backgroundTint">@color/surface_variant</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/on_surface_variant</item> </style>
<style name="Widget.PaxelAR.Button.Outlined" parent="Widget.Material3.Button.OutlinedButton"> <item name="strokeColor">@color/primary</item> <item name="strokeWidth">2dp</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/primary</item> <item name="android:textAllCaps">false</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">sans-serif-medium</item> <item name="cornerRadius">12dp</item> <item name="android:minHeight">48dp</item> <item name="android:paddingStart">24dp</item> <item name="android:paddingEnd">24dp</item> </style>
<style name="Widget.PaxelAR.Button.Text" parent="Widget.Material3.Button.TextButton"> <item name="android:textColor">@color/primary</item> <item name="android:textAllCaps">false</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">sans-serif-medium</item> <item name="cornerRadius">12dp</item> <item name="android:minHeight">48dp</item> </style>
<!-- Card styles --> <style name="Widget.PaxelAR.CardView" parent="Widget.Material3.CardView.Elevated"> <item name="cardBackgroundColor">@color/surface</item> <item name="cardCornerRadius">16dp</item> <item name="cardElevation">4dp</item> <item name="android:layout_margin">8dp</item> </style>
<!-- Typography Styles --> <style name="TextAppearance.PaxelAR.Label" parent="TextAppearance.Material3.LabelLarge"> <item name="android:textColor">@color/measurement_label</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">sans-serif-medium</item> <item name="android:textSize">12sp</item> <item name="android:letterSpacing">0.03</item> <item name="android:textAllCaps">true</item> </style>
<style name="TextAppearance.PaxelAR.Value" parent="TextAppearance.Material3.BodyLarge"> <item name="android:textColor">@color/measurement_value</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">sans-serif</item> <item name="android:textSize">16sp</item> <item name="android:letterSpacing">0.01</item> </style>
<!-- Brand Typography - Missing style that was causing error --> <style name="TextAppearance.PaxelAR.Brand" parent="TextAppearance.Material3.HeadlineLarge"> <item name="android:textColor">@color/primary</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">sans-serif-medium</item> <item name="android:letterSpacing">0.02</item> <item name="android:textSize">32sp</item> </style>
<!-- Toolbar styles --> <style name="Widget.PaxelAR.Toolbar" parent="Widget.Material3.Toolbar"> <item name="android:background">@color/primary</item> <item name="titleTextColor">@color/on_primary</item> <item name="subtitleTextColor">@color/on_primary</item> <item name="android:theme">@style/ThemeOverlay.Material3.Dark</item> </style>
<!-- Text Input Layout --> <style name="Widget.PaxelAR.TextInputLayout" parent="Widget.Material3.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox"> <item name="boxStrokeColor">@color/primary</item> <item name="hintTextColor">@color/on_surface_variant</item> <item name="android:textColorHint">@color/on_surface_variant</item> </style> </resources>
